testcase.name: Wallet Connection Flow › should display wallet connection button on homepage
Wallet Connection Flow › should show RainbowKit modal when connect button is clicked
Wallet Connection Flow › should display wallet provider options in modal
Wallet Connection Flow › should close modal when cancel/close button is clicked
Wallet Connection Flow › should handle no wallet provider gracefully
Wallet Connection Flow › should persist wallet connection state in localStorage
Wallet Connection Flow › should display proper loading state during connection
Wallet Connection Flow › should show network selection in wallet modal
Wallet Connection Flow › should display wallet address in shortened format when connected
Wallet Connection Flow › should handle connection rejection by user
Wallet Connection - Responsive Design › should display wallet connection on mobile viewport
Wallet Connection - Responsive Design › should open mobile-optimized wallet modal
SIWE Authentication Flow › should retrieve SIWE nonce from backend
SIWE Authentication Flow › should display SIWE message after wallet connection
SIWE Authentication Flow › should generate valid SIWE message with correct fields
SIWE Authentication Flow › should handle successful SIWE signature and receive JWT
SIWE Authentication Flow › should store JWT token in localStorage after authentication
SIWE Authentication Flow › should handle signature rejection gracefully
SIWE Authentication Flow › should display error message on invalid signature
SIWE Authentication Flow › should persist authentication state across page refreshes
SIWE Authentication Flow › should handle token expiration

API Key Management - Creation Flow › should provide copy-to-clipboard for new API key

API Key Management - Listing & Display › should show API key metadata (name, created date, scopes)

API Key Management - Revocation › should show revoke/delete button for each API key
API Key Management - Revocation › should show confirmation dialog before revoking key
API Key Management - Revocation › should allow canceling revocation
API Key Management - Permissions › should not allow non-authenticated users to access API keys page
API Key Management - Permissions › should display API key count/usage statistics
Complete User Journey - New User Flow › should complete full journey: Connect → Sign → Create API Key
Complete User Journey - New User Flow › should persist authentication across multiple page navigations
Complete User Journey - New User Flow › should handle browser refresh while authenticated
Complete User Journey - Returning User Flow › should auto-authenticate returning user with valid token
Complete User Journey - Returning User Flow › should prompt re-authentication if token is expired

Complete User Journey - Logout Flow › should redirect to home after logout from protected page
Complete User Journey - Navigation › should navigate between all main sections when authenticated
Complete User Journey - Navigation › should show active navigation state for current page
Complete User Journey - Error Handling › should handle network errors gracefully
Complete User Journey - Error Handling › should handle invalid JWT token gracefully
Complete User Journey - Error Handling › should handle missing localStorage gracefully
Complete User Journey - Mobile Experience › should complete full journey on mobile viewport
Complete User Journey - Mobile Experience › should handle mobile wallet connection
Complete User Journey - Performance › should load homepage within acceptable time
Complete User Journey - Performance › should handle rapid navigation without errors
